<公共请求参数>

    "InstanceId": "cmgo-9d0p****",
    "UserName": "test_user",

    "MongoUserPassword": "Abc@123...",
    "UserDesc": "测试用户",

        {
            "Mask": 0,
            "NameSpace": "collection"
        }
    ]
}

CreateDBInstance.document: 当前示例仅适合4.0版本，其余版本请严格参考传入参数中各版本说明项

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDBInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VpcId": "vpc-0akbol5v",
    "GoodsNum": 1,
    "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-2",
    "ProjectId": 0,
    "MachineCode": "HIO10G",
    "Period": 1,
    "ClusterType": "REPLSET",
    "Volume": 250,
    "MongoVersion": "MONGO_40_WT",
    "NodeNum": 3,
    "ReplicateSetNum": 1,
    "Memory": 4,
    "SubnetId": "subnet-fyrtjbqw",
    "Password": "pwd123456"
}
CreateDBInstance.title: 创建包年包月的云数据库实例

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: 调整云数据库实例配置

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.document: 广州二区和三区共删除2个从节点，最终节点数量变更为3
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceSpec
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-abcdef",
    "Memory": 4,
    "Volume": 100,
    "OplogSize": 30,
    "NodeNum": 3,
    "ReplicateSetNum": 1,
    "InMaintenance": 1,
    "RemoveNodeList": [
        {
            "NodeName": "cmgo-3iecwbfx_0-node0",
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-2"
        },
        {
            "NodeName": "cmgo-3iecwbfx_0-node1",
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3"
        }
    ]
}
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: 删除 mongodb 云数据库实例从节点

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.document: 广州二区和三区共新增2个从节点，最终节点数量变更为5
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceSpec
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-p8vn****",
    "Memory": 4,
    "Volume": 100,
    "OplogSize": 30,
    "NodeNum": 5,
    "ReplicateSetNum": 1,
    "InMaintenance": 1,
    "AddNodeList": [
        {
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-2"
        },
        {
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3"
        }
    ]
}
